snippet: The hope is to hand out free pills once a year to 400 million Indians at risk of the disease, which disfigures limbs.
abstract: India's Ministry of Health plans to hand out free medication once a year to 400 million citizens most at risk of contracting elephantiasis, or lymphatic filariasis.
lead_paragraph: The hope is to hand out free pills once a year to 400 million Indians at risk of the disease, which disfigures limbs.

headline.print_headline: India Begins Campaign to Eliminate Elephantiasis
headline.main: India Begins Campaign to Eliminate Elephantiasis
